data.text:
@nycgov For all those who are new to this working from home Bitcoin trading options 

Here's a little tip:

Get a trusted Bitcoin expert and stick to her @Lisa_Laura39

Invest and play at similar times each day.
Because :
In times of chaos, your investment is your anchor to success⚖️
@nycgov Too bad @nycHealthy wants to keep our toddlers muzzled. Lowest risk, highest burden. #unmaskourtoddlers
@nycgov Over two weeks ago you fired people that would not take the vaccine yet now your are lowering mandates. What changed? So does that mean people get their jobs back?
